summary: NHTSA RECALL 16V384 WAS ISSUED A YEAR AGO FOR THE PASSENGER AIR BAG INFLATOR ON MY CAR.  I PHONED THE FORD DEALER TODAY 6/26/2017 AND WAS TOLD THAT PARTS ARE STILL NOT AVAILABLE FOR THE REPAIR.  IF FORD CAN OBTAIN MILLIONS OF AIR BAGS FOR THE NEW CARS THEY HAVE DESIGNED, MANUFACTURED, AND SOLD SINCE THIS RECALL WAS ISSUED, IT IS UNACCEPTABLE AND INEXCUSABLE THAT THEY CANNOT OBTAIN PARTS FOR THIS RECALL REPAIR IN A TIMELY MANNER.
